      • usernameInserted

        private void usernameInserted()
                       throws java.io.IOException
        verifies if the username is correct. verifies if the username not already exists. verifies if the user is reconnecting. If it's all verified start/rejoin the match, otherwise stop the client
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - any exception thrown by the underlying OutputStream
